eyb:GuardStance.NAME: Guard Stance
DESCRIPTION: Upon entering this Stance: ALL characters gain 10 Block. NL Start of Turn: You gain 10 Block.  ALL enemies gain 15 Block.

eyb:OrbStance.NAME: Orb Stance
DESCRIPTION: You have +4 [Focus] while in this Stance.  Upon entering this stance, Lose 1 [Strength] and 1 [Dexterity].  Lose 1 [Strength] and 1 [Dexterity] at end of turn or when you exit of this stance.

eyb:ForceStance.NAME: Force Stance
DESCRIPTION: [F] is always #yRetained. Other [A-Gen] #yPowers cannot be gained. NL If re-entered: #yBoost [F]
